root.name: Spot detection utilities
root.description: A set of classes and functions which can be used by plugins performing spot detection and spot tracking.
root.author: nchenouard - Nicolas Chenouard
root.changelog:
- Version 1.1.0.6 Date 2014-03-01 18:07:06
Added custom name of for DetectionResult.
- Version 1.1.0.5 Date 2013-06-28 18:02:52
Removed the detection painting method to comply with the new policy of the TrackManager plugin.
- Version 1.1.0.4 Date 2012-10-11 16:13:18
Removed log that could slow down the loading process of tracks in the track manager.
- Version 1.1.0.3 Date 2011-12-07 16:04:54
Detection contained in the track manager are now in this plugin
- Version 1.1.0.2 Date 2011-10-27 09:56:33
- Version 1.1.0.1 Date 2011-10-06 14:03:56
switch to stable
- Version 1.1.0.0b Date 2011-10-06 13:34:30
- Serialization of Spot class removed - Spot : Add min, max and average intensity public properties (by fab)
- Version 1.0.0.1 Date 2011-04-11 22:02:36
Removed the class DetectionSpot which was duplicated in fab.spotDetector. Only this class should be used from now.
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2011-03-25 13:15:56
